description: Tweaking is encouraged - set up /5/Comprehensive/5/ to be enjoyable for you!
&&7[ModMenu]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6ESCAPE&&r&&7]&&r and find the clipboard button to open the mod menu, allowing you to change client-side options for mods in the pack.
&&7[Iris]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6ALT+I&&r&&7]&&r to configure &&3shaders&&r, and &&7[&&r&&6ALT+K&&r&&7]&&r to toggle them once configured.
&&7[Presence Footsteps]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6ALT+P&&r&&7]&&r to adjust the volume or gait of your footsteps.
&&7[Dynamic Surroundings]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6ALT-;&&r&&7]&&r to adjust ambient biome sounds as well as sounds and visuals from waterfalls, steam jets, etc.
